content: For a while, accessibility to the entire Discussion Forums was not possible last night. This was across the boards... E-mails were sent out and replies stated the same thing...inaccessible. So far...there has NOT been ANY mention of this FUBAR, and what prompted it... It would be 'really nice' to hear from 'the Head Shed' as to come forward with some plausible, if not some acceptable answer... Short of 'my dog chewed the power cable', or 'the hamster died on the treadmill', due consideration is warranted for all.
